Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Good, but far from the excellent experiences we‚Äôve had at the Jean Georges restaurants in New York. The New Year‚Äôs Eve menu was way overpriced.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We had a great visit to Market and highly recommend it.  There were 5 of us and each truly enjoyed their meal.  Service was exceptional by the entire team.  We would all go back.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Alles super. Ich kann nur weiter empfehlen. Essen war super lecker. Service war hervorragend. Die Preise sind nicht billig. Aber es hat sich schon gelohnt.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Outstanding evening - ginger margaritas are not to be missed.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Very good food for a reasonable price considering the location!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Recently dined at Market on our visit to Paris from London for two diners and was very impressed! The kind waiter was very attentive from the minute we arrived and brought us a conplimetary burrata with our starters of butternut squash soup and prawn skewers (both which were delicious). The main course followed with fillet steak which was also delicious and a chocolate cake for dessert which was outstanding! Was also served with some salted caramel ice cream on the house. Overall a great night, great service and food and the decor and ambience is great. Highly recommend!
Thank you to all the staff!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Das essen war atemberaubend.
Bei der Bar w√ºrde ich etwas mehr auf Hygiene achten und der Service muss an den englisch Kenntnissen arbeiten

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Came here with my husband for Christmas Day dinner. His pork chop was uncooked and he couldn‚Äôt even eat it. I ordered the ricotta ravioli and it was 4 raviolis over tomatoes sauce, I‚Äôve made better from ravioli in a box. Actually Trader Joe‚Äôs frozen ravioli bag has more flavor. Restaurant itself is beautiful, our waiter was friendly, but value and flavor of the meal were unsatisfactory, expensive for no reason. I do not recommend.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: This meal was a highlight of our trip and somewhat unexpected. We anticipated the food would be good, but were blown away by how good.  After a few days of heavier food, it was also very nice to have a few salad and lighter options that were just phenomenal.  Our pickiest eater had the ‚Äútomato, mozzarella, basil‚Äù pizza and cast aside the usual sauce aversion and loved the pizza. The desserts were also a hit from the sundae, to the lava cake, to the cheesecake.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Nice place in an excellent location. The staff also very nice ans accesible.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
It would be nice without Chartmusic Out of the speaker.
The food was good quality, but the ingrediens where midclass all in all. 
Its a shame, because the service where very frendly and trys to Help all the time.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Beautiful presentation. Excellent food

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Understaffed for the Xmas eve occasion, so service was too slow but reactive when prompted.
Chicken meat was undercooked (!) in papillote.
The rest was excellent but overall too pricy.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Yellen was amazing, the absolute best service! My favorite restaurant in Paris, hands down! Can‚Äôt wait to go back. And get the cheesecake!!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: From the point we entered and until we left, we the hospitality and service were impeccable. The hosts, servers and managers made it an awesome experience. The food was delicious and we do plan to come back again!! Highly recommend this place.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We always enjoy eating at restaurants under the direction of Jean- George. We had great service from our lady server named Morgan. The chicken and coconut soup was extremely flavorful and tasty, and this may have been the best Thai chicken and coconut soup I have eaten, especially in Paris! We also enjoyed the black plate appetizer which had generous proportions of chicken samosas, crab rolls, tuna rolls, crispy salmon sushi, and shrimp saut√©. The crispy salmon sushi and the shrimp saut√© were my favorites, and my wife loved the chicken samosas. It was a great meal and a pleasant evening at the market by Jean George.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Gorgeous, loved the food, loved the place and had a lovely waitress, very attentive and chatty. Had the black plate and pizza, both delicious. Dessert was gorgeous too. Will definitely be back next time I'm in Paris

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: What a wonderful experience, food absolutely delicious  service was 1st class.  Highly recommended.  If in Paris again would definitely be visiting this restaurant.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Very nice restaurant in a nice part of Paris. Waiter was outstanding. Food was delicious.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
√âquipe toujours professionnelle et tr√®s chaleureuse
Un r√©gal pour tout. Merci
David S√©bastien

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Food good, team not to the level that it should be for such a high end venue.

Host at cloakroom, on phone and showed no interest. Couldn‚Äôt recommend where nearest metro was.

Waiter, inexperienced, friendly enough but no wow hospitality. Nice bday plate/dessert for my wife‚Äôs bday.

Chefs all mucking around when visiting the toilets and could be heard from the dining upstairs. Didn‚Äôt seem professional albeit looked immaculate.

Went to the Connaught JG and level of service was 10 x higher and more enjoyable.

Chipped crockery (stripped plates) on the table setting at arrival.

6/10 experience. To be fair an experience is just about ambience and service as the food quality.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Very nice menu and good food. We were happy with everything

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: It was ok but not amazing. The service was good and the staff are very friendly which is nice but the food didn't blow us away.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Yellen was amazing and food was as classic as always Jean Georges.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Accueil, tr√®s sympathique, qualit√© culinaire, irr√©prochable, service efficace. 
Seul b√©mol, la salle est tr√®s bruyante .
C‚Äô√©tait peut-√™tre aussi li√© √† une table ¬´¬†tr√®s bruyante¬†¬ª

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Nous avons mang√© des entre√©s qui √©taient tres bonnes. Burrata, brochette etaient delicieux. Linguine etait moyenne. Je n'ai trouv√© la sauce trop citron√©. Nous √©tions 8 et notre table est situe√© dans un coin pas bruitant qui etait bien pour parler pendent le diner. Au total nous √©tions contents du dinner.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: So nice, we dined twice! This is a new favorite! Fresh, delicious food and drinks. They do everything well, from the preparation of the drinks and food to the service.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Amazing service and delicious food!! Our waiter Aiden was super friendly and sooo attentive, had a lovely chat with him despite how busy the restaurant was. Also lovely meeting Rajul who gave us free whiskey on the house! Superb!!! Highly recommend, a must visit. We will be back

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great place to go in Paris; upscale, delicious, great service, calming environment focused on the food. We have been here many times, often dining here when in Paris. A mistaken order on one of our mains (these things happen) was rectified graciously and swiftly. It was the only glitch in an otherwise perfect evening.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent food great staff, exceeded my expectations

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great service. Great food. Great location! Will definitely be back.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Phenomenal food and service. A fantastic choice in walking distance of where we were staying in the 8th. The hosts couldn't have been more welcoming - receiving us with open arms from the rain. The waiter's amazing memory skills only added to the delectable dishes we chose. Loved it and the birthday fuss as fantastic and authentic!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Delicious chicken samosas! And the chilli pasta linguine was also very tasty. Very grateful to staff for continuing to serve us drinks until long after kitchen closed. They were also good about letting us order food at 330pm when kitchen was closing. Much appreciated. Perfectly located; contemporary decor; accommodated a large party.  Will be back!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Simply lovely! Staff amazing. Location great. Eiffel Tower can be seen from the entrance. Beautiful decor and the best Sancerre wine ever.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: My husband said this was the best meal he‚Äôs had in a restaurant in the past 30 years. I would have to agree.Everything was phenomenal .. the wine, the satay shrimp appetizer, the sea scallops, the broiled breem.. all outstanding!!  Warren, our server was gracious, knowledgeable and patient..  five stars all around!!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Clean, modern and excellent cuisine! Every single dish is made of fresh ingredients with respect for the products used. 
Great variety of dishes on the menu. 
Superb sundae caramel - the best one we‚Äôve tried. 
Definitely a place to come back.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Our entire experience was fantastic, we would recommend this restaurant!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Best lunch EVAH!  Don‚Äôt miss‚Ä¶

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Good food and service we had a great time the pork was amazing

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Over rated restaurant with very average food like most high end restaurants in Paris and be careful sometimes they over charge you pay attention to your bill

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Amazing service amazing meal would highly recommend

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: This is a fantastic restaurant in a great location. The food was excellent, the service attentive without being intrusive. And the hostess who greeted us and showed us to our table I think might be the most beautiful woman in all of France.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The waiter was professional in every way. The food was delicious and the serving was beautiful.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Food is very good. Service not so good. It looked like there was one person serving all the tables.  Ridiculous for such a high end restaurant.  There was other white stuff, but only one person that came to our table

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Incredible management and experience all around . Definitely worth the visit!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Impeccable staff created a fabulous evening with world class dishes. Grilled Octopus was the best I‚Äôve ever had any where in the world. The staff was on point and very helpful. Well done!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Everything that we ordered was delicious! The food quality and presentation were excellent - just like the customer service!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Nice upscale place. We both ordered from the simply cooked menus   We had beef tenderloin Ôøº. And the scallops.  We order the guacamole salad. Ôøº
We had the cheesecake for dessert as recommended by our waiter who was exceedingly efficient.
Overall A+.  Would return. Ôøº

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Sleek and sophisticated restaurant with spectacular menu options all prepared exquisitely.  Can‚Äôt wait to go back!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Three of four Pour quality entree expected more from Jean Goeorge

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: I just spent 4 nights in Paris and this was by far the best meal I had. My cousin and I enjoyed every course. She ordered the steak and I had the scallops and both were outstanding. The chocolate dessert was sublime and the service was amazing.  We came here on our first night, and we wished we had time to come again during our trip. It blew away every other restaurant we went to. This was recommended to me by a friend, and I cant wait to recommend it to others. I will definitely be returning here on my next trip to Paris!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The maitre d was fantastic. Visited table 3 separate times to make certain things were good. Don't see service like that very often.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent service and the dishes were exceptional.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: From start to finish, we felt welcomed. The space is lovely, and the food is beautifully prepared and presented. Certainly a place we will return to when next in Paris.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great restaurant, staff was friendly, food was great

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Food was very good and the staff so friendly.
I would really recommend this place

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Amazing food and service!  Also loved the ambience and the location

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The food, the service, & the ambience were exquisite!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Best meal we‚Äôve had in France! Oonagh and Adrian were wonderful!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Delicious fusion food and incredibly friendly, attentive service from Rajoo and his staff. A very memorable meal in Paris and we will most certainly be back!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent food and service. Beautiful space and diverse, interesting menu.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Very good food
Excellent service
Good location
Waiters are very friendly

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Modern French restaurant with a great cuisine on the lighter side - it was a very nice change and experience. Very friendly service

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent restaurant, a real must do once in Paris.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Absolutely outstanding in every way. Wish I had discovered this venue when I arrived to Paris a week ago. Beautiful restaurant with an imaginative menu and friendly staff. Will be dining at Chef‚Äôs restaurants in Miami and New York upon our return to the States. Whether you are in Paris for business or pleasure, this must be on your list for fine dining at extremely reasonable prices. And they make an excellent dirty martini!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The atmosphere is very nice, the place is impressive. Food was good not great. The value for the $ left a lot to be desired. We had about three different people coming to our table but none when we needed another drink. Not sure the staff identified themselves as waitress, server, manager at any point. I just know we saw each one once and then not again. Honestly, not worth the $

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: A hidden Gem. Excellent food and service; very nice patio and lovely spacious dining room. Easy to make a reservation last minute.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Clean, modern interior.  Good food. Great spot for intimate date or dinner with family/friends/associates.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Nous avons d√Æn√© au Market plusieurs fois au fil des ans, mais c'√©tait notre premi√®re visite depuis avant l'√©pid√©mie de Covid en 2020 et nous avons √©t√© ravis de constater que le Market est meilleur que jamais. Nous reviendrons plus souvent √† l'avenir.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Shrimp satay and bream were fantastic. Ravioli was very good too.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Food was ok. Not impressed.
Staff was extremely nice, polite and helpful.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
I found the restaurant via Open table and it didn‚Äôt disappoint. The service, food and ambience will be memorable! The manager,  Floren, and our server, Aiden, were AMAZING and made the entire experience wonderful.
We both ordered the lamb chops, but with sauces all on the side to be sure it was to our liking. The manager was patient and reassured us that we‚Äôd like it all put together. He was so right! Once we tasted separately, we had to combine the flavors which made the dish complete.
The peach cobbler with berries and homemade ice cream were perfect as well!
I will return to this restaurant on my next trip back to Paris!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Our server was superb.  The restaurant has a wonderful atmosphere.  The food was out of this world.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: I really wanted to celebrate my birthday here. And It was excellent I booked the last slot for lunch though it was difficult to find and we arrived a few minutes late they were most gracious. Catered to me and the kids. The meals and it‚Äôs  presentation was a delight each bite complimented the last. They even celebrated my birthday in French and English. Overall it was beyond. My expectations are met and exceeded

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
delicious carpacio de Thon but alas the entree of turbot appeared as two small, very thin tail ends of the fish that were well overcooked and useful for re-soling my shoes. I compained but nothing happenedas a result - not even a regret -  which shows deep contempt for clinets by serving staff and breathtaking arrogance from the kitchen staff.

Neither of these things should detract from the good points of the restuaurant, but alas, they do. Massively. I hope themanager is listening intently as THIS WILL NOT DO.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The wait staff was incredibly helpful and friendly, and the food was delicious. The ‚Äúblack plate‚Äù was a must!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Second time here. And the food is always great, was busy this time so service was 4/5 but always a great experience. Will do it again next time in Paris. Two courses 3 drinks each around ‚Ç¨250

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
The food was healthy and excellent.
The service is outstanding
Reataurant was very quiet as we went in the middle of august.
Great choice ! Would recommend

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Good food and nice atmosphere

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Our server was excellent, charming, friendly and knowledgeable.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: In my opinion, foods are not authentic French style in this restaurant compared to other French restaurant. However, location and service were great.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you Thank you

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent food, very good cocktail. Service was attentive

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great experience! Our waiter was very friendly and served us very nicely

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The food was great. Service attentive and not overdo.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We went to Market  by Jean-Georges for our anniversary. The ambiance was very nice and the service was excellent. The prices were a little high, especially the deserts, which started at $20. It was good but not large enough or that much better than another deserts we have had for much less. We started with the fried calamari which was nicely lightly breaded but was rubbery, not like good calamari I've had that melts in your mouth. My wife had the beef with white asparagus. The beef was cooked perfectly and was very good. The asparagus was half cooked just right and half over cooked. I don't know how you do that. I had the salmon and zucchini. Both were cooked just right and were very good.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent food, service, and ambience. Nice for a special occasion!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
I've eaten at this J-G restaurant several times previously - as well as other restaurants  that he oversees.  This was likely the best meal that I've ever had in any of his restaurants.  I chose an appetizer and main course that are new to his repertoire and both were exceptionally great.  Service was professional, polished and friendly.  
I looked forward to this meal on my final evening in Paris - and this was the culinary highlight.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Made the perfect ending to our busy first day in Paris. Food was wonderful and service was fantastic. Our waiter, Cedric was attentive to our table and our son‚Äôs nut allergies. Chicken dish is one of the top 5 chicken dishes I have ever had. Great ambiance and kid friendly! Definitely would come back. Recommend highly!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Please improve the quality of your menu. Just having a big Chef‚Äôs name doesn‚Äôt do it. Service and quality are of great importance if you are placed at a strategic location. Paris is loosing its charm and it‚Äôs a real shame that France being the gastronomical capital of the world is not keeping up with its prestige made by earlier generations. Mind you having a name behind is only marketing not value to the food serves to the paying client. 

Mediocre ingredients, lacks standard and missing the French savoir faire.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The cheeseburger was $35.  The bun was fresh out of a grocery store bag, no toasting.  I would have expected much more at their prices.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Brought family here. First time in Paris for some of the family members and wanted to treat them to a great Parisian meal.
Sad to say was disappointed by the food and the service while friendly enough was slow and not very helpful or attentive.  Took forever to just get some butter for the bread.
Had better food and service at a regular French brasserie.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Diner extr√™mement  d√©cevant, nourriture tr√®s quelconque apr√®s pourtant une bonne exp√©rience l‚Äôann√©e derni√®re mais le chef √©tait probablement en vacances. Au d√©but du d√Æner il a fallu se lever chercher un serveur pour commander du vin, au fond de la salle on nous avait oubli√©

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Excellent ingredients, perfectly cooked. Best ever calamari fritti - with parmesan and a spicy green sauce. Perfect poached egg for the eggs benedict. John Dory cooked perfectly, with crispy skin and a delicious habanero and lime sauce.
Prices a bit high, but pleasant ambience, very spacious.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: I cannot say enough about this restaurant.  The food was incredible, as was the service.  They have an amazing wine list as well.  Do yourself a favor when you're in Paris and make the effort to dine here.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We had a great experience. My wife and 2 kids went there for dinner. We ordered numerous plates and shared. All the food was delicious. It was a little non the expensive side but worth it. The sever was also very attentive and provided some good recommendations.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Our server Morgan was amazing and we really enjoyed our meal.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Excellent as always, will come again for sure.

thanks very much

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great place with very nice staff. The food is always delicious. A little noisy sometime but you can easily get a table in a quiter area!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We had the most wonderful meal here the service we received from Morgane was outstanding and the food was sublime. Some may say this restaurant is a little expensive , however you are in Paris and we felt it was worth every Euro

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Surprising and delicious. Creative and exquisite while also proposing Jean Georges‚Äôs classics. I am a big fan.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Booked this with the recommendation from our hotel. I got nervous after reading some of the reviews here. Don‚Äôt listen those people, they‚Äôre probably younger, spoiled, entitled idiots. Or maybe just old and grumpy, idk. I‚Äôm 40, from Los Angeles and have dined all over‚Ä¶ this place was fantastic! Took my daughter, she loved it. Our server, Aiden, was new and we would not have known; super helpful, friendly any attentive

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: What a joke ! Living and paris and knowing food   This is the worst of paris   I lived in nyc and went to jean George lots on Central Park west   And this one I s nothing like it.  What a shame !

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Food was great. Cedric provided great service. Nice quiet dinner just off the hustle and bustle of CDL.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Jean George should either commit to having a great resteraunt in Paris , or just close it up
It hurts his brand , service was not knowledgable of menu , took 15 minutes before water was brought to table and resteraunt was half empty , we eat a lot on his NY Resteraunts and this is not fitting

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Wonderful tasty food. Fresh ingredients. Nice ginger margarita that tasted better than it sounds. Lovely contemporary decor. Good service, present but not overly hovering.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: I went here for my birthday, the food & service was great! I would definitely go again.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent meal and service. Very helpful with choices in English.  Cocktails were fabulous.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Food was ok. Service was slow.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Definitely not the Jean-Georges standard I expected!  His restaurant in NYC several years ago was superb.  I expected the same at Market in Paris.  It is not!  Definitely not fine dining.  Food was very good but not excellent.    4 tables with children.  1 table of children extremely loud while another table had a child who had brought a bottle of bubbles and was blowing bubbles during dinner. Wait staff at times appeared bored and aloof. One waiter was standing in the middle of the dining room scratching his eye repeatedly and then looking at his finger apparently trying to get something out of his eye - again, in the middle of the dining room.  To cap it off, my waitress disappeared at the end of our meal.  I asked another waiter to find her.  She still never showed up.  I then had to walk to the hostess stand to ask to pay.  They found my waitress outside on the sidewalk talking to someone as I could see out the front door.  Overall extremely disappointing.  A Saturday evening out in Paris turned into more Ronald McDonald than Jean-Georges.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Chic and cool ambience with great food to match and an excellent Sancerre.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Overall good, not great.  Artichoke starter was tasty, but full of cooking oil.  Turbot was delicious and very well prepared, just slightly small portion.  Staff friendly and helpful.  Very nice wine selection and although the waitress wasn‚Äôt a drinker, made good recommendations.  I do feel it was a bit of a tourist trap and can‚Äôt to tell if the restaurant is trying to be more formal/upscale, but the other restaurant goers were not dressed as well as one would expect of a finer dining experience.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Nice food, excellent bred. Dishes are very good.
Price are somehow high (half a bottle of water ‚Ç¨ 10 for example).
Noise is an issue when the restaurant has many clients.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great atmosphere and wonderful food! Would definitely go back!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We had an excellent waiter that was attentive and knowledgeable. The food was fantastic. We were there for a long time and they did not rush us. Over all definitely will come back next time in Paris.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: From The Hostess to our Server (forgot to get their names) but they treated us so well on our celebration for our engagement dinner. Love this place , the service , the ambiance (sade music is great) and the food cant forget those amazing dishes we had!  Will Always recommend to everyone! Thank you for all your hospitality

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We had a great experience for dinner. The food was delicious and the service was excellent!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent meal and service. Overall a very good experience. I will come back!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Service was poor waitress was clearly ready to leave she told us that we needed to hurry and order because the kitchen was closing soon although another party arrived well after us and took their time ordering and were not rushed by their sever.  They looked very comfortable and even had to prompt the server to get more drinks.  I was celebrating a birthday and they didn‚Äôt even acknowledge it although it was included on the reservation.  Food was okay but not worth the price and poor customer service.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Exactly what you would expect from JG. Inventive, well delivers and wonderful tastes.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Service took FOREVER, food meh, ambiance good, was hoping for more, wouldn‚Äôt recommend

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
We arrived near closing time after a spontaneous change of dinner plans.  The staff was fantastic!  Very accommodating, including as we impulsively changed our table after ten minutes.

We didn't have a big appetite, so can't report on lots of dishes, but our apps and drinks hit the mark.

We love Jean-Georges' New York restaurants, and the hospitality, quality and ambiance of Market made it quite clear...we were in the warm and capable hands of a Jean-Georges team.

Chapeaux to GM Razoo and the staff...including one of our terrific servers, Cedric!  A welcoming experience, steps from the Champs!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: I‚Äôve eaten here several times - basically whenever I‚Äôm in Paris.  It‚Äôs a wonderful go to place to take first time visitors to the city - great food - great ambiance & service with a menu selection that can please ¬´¬†out-of-towners¬†¬ª especially business associates.  It‚Äôs in a great location close to Le Bristol for an elegant cocktail before or after.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The wine list differs from the one on the web site. Couldn‚Äôt find most of the premium (grand cru) wines in selection. But food is exceptional!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Overal outstanding experience. Vegan options available.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The food and service were fantastic; I had crab rolls and the salmon roll appetizers, and then a nice piece of grilled fish for my entre. I‚Äôd dine there again when I return to Paris.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Amazing food and even better staff! Management greeted us and explained how they are the only ones in the city that make the Black Plate!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Took 40 minutes for them to take a drink Ôøºorder and it was 2 hours total before our food arrived. Food over cooked

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Everything we ate was spectacular! This was my second time at a restaurant by Jean-George and he is the best! The food will not disappoint you

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Muy bien realmente poca gente pero comida deliciosa

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Das Essen ist nichts besonderes und die So√üen sind zu fade.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Unfortunately the food at this restaurant missed the mark.  The service and overall atmosphere was very nice but the food did not live up to the Jean George name.

First out calamari had to be sent back because it was over cooked.  Our pasta dish with pesto was not seasoned did not have enough pesto and the chicken we added was cooked until it looked like a crouton. Chicken and artichoke dish was not seasoned and chicken was over cooked, ravioli was cold and not seasoned lastly the lamb chops were decent but nothing special.

Hopefully they will make some changes going forward

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Really slow service unfortunately. Almost an hour between courses. No follow up at table whatsoever. Food was average.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent wine selection to go with the delicious food. Manager came over and talked to us for a bit- even sent us two desserts for free since we drank and ate so much. Very nice staff and we will definitely return when we go back to Paris.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The restaurant is very modern unlike the steak house at the aria when is decidedly French decor.  This restaurant is on a beautiful street in a beautiful city

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Great experience! Manager Raju and wait staff very attentive and friendly

Food is excellent! Craft being maintained by chef.. NY to Paris some dishes tasted the same.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Highly recommend!!! Excellent service and delicious food!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Fantastic meal and great service, 5 of us ranging in age from 12 to 84 went and all really enjoyed it.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The restaurant was uncomfortably hot. They wouldn‚Äôt put on AC and said the door was open when we mentioned it (it wasn‚Äôt even). The food was distinctly average. The staff was aloof. And to top it all off they added 40 euros for no apparent reason. The bill just had the total without any itemisation. It was only when we asked for the breakdown that we noticed the extra item, which they promptly took off and said it was someone else‚Äôs item that went on our bill by mistake. No apologies or anything. Avoid at all costs.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Seemingly unpleasant to Americans. Lamb was raw/rare. Poor seasoning, asked us to order food before we were given drink menus. Atmosphere was good, location is good, food was below average.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Amazing food and amazing service. Everything was wonderful, would definitely recommend and return again.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Very enjoyable meal. We shared several dishes and loved each one. They were very helpful with my gluten free requests. The food was fresh, well presented and delicious. Great cocktails, too. Would definitely recommend

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Food was excellent. The wait staff was courteous. The drinks were great as well.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The staff and food were beyond amazing! The only thing I could have wished for was more of an atmosphere.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Very fresh and excellently prepared food. Service was friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. They were most accommodating our dietary needs (gluten and dairy sensitivities) and even provided very good gluten-free bread.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excelente ambiente, la comida deliciosa y muy buen servicio

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Friendly staff however food was not great, especially at the price. Had the crab roles (under cooked) and shrimp salad, creamy sauce was tastie but the vinegar, particularly on its own, was not good

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Starters fantastic, meal was good,
Omg loveeeeeddd the drinks, the cheesecake with sorbet was amazing! I‚Äôm definitely coming back.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
They did not have a dish I wanted.
Service was not great
Allowed a child to scream in the restaurant t
Very pricey for what you get

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Food and Service were incredible, Ambience was very modern and felt worth the money. 

Only Letdown are prices for drinks, 9 Euros for a can of Sprite is too much, no matter the quality of the food. Cocktails were expensive aswell, mostly 18 Euros, the Mojito was still the best I ever had.

Overall I would still come again.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Food overpriced for the quality of food. Had the crusted chicken and it was so dry I could hardly get through the meal.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Nice place. Not the same quality of food as Jean Gorges restaurants in New York.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Lots of Americans, large menu but food was average at best.  They tend to use the same sauces on different dishes (pasta dish and chicken dish, for example) so everything tastes a lot the same. The wine list was extensive and not real expensive, but we didn‚Äôt stay for dessert since our expectations had been crushed.  We have eaten at several Jean-Georges restaurants in NYC, but this one does his reputation no favors.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Excelente atenci√≥n de
Todo el personal, platillos muy bien presentados, buenos coctel, muy recomendable en Par√≠s

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Service is outstanding. Food is very good. Great relaxed upscale atmosphere.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great food, nice crowd and very pleasant & efficient service

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We are visiting from American and found this restaurant on open table. My friend and I were very pleased. The food was great, the staff were friendly, and the ambiance was lovely. Would definitely recommend this place to others

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
We ate at Michelin star restaurants and many other highly rated restaurants in Paris, but Market remained at the top of our list!
The tranquil but upbeat ambiance, lighting are a start. The service never disappoints. Kind, respectful, competent, anxious to please.

And, of course, the food.

I ordered the spiced crusted sea bream with sweet and sour broth, and crispy artichokes for both of my dinners!  The sea bream had a crispy skin, and delicate, moist mean - hard to achieve in a thin fish. And the broth was just the right quantity with a lovely not too spicy, not too sweet, interesting flavor.

For dessert, the last time, I ordered Mille-crepe br√ªl√©e au grand mariner, coulis de mangue et passion - this was the first time I ever tasted a dessert like this - different, delicate, just enough sweetness, but a texture to dream of. Like Mille but the texture of a delicate layered crepe.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Dinner for our last night in Paris.  Everything was magnificent!  Spectacular food and service!!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Delicious food and very nice and attentive service

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Outstanding service. Delicious food. Pleasing ambiance. What more can one ask?

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Lovely ambiance and wonderful service/staff. The food was delicious too!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Fine ambiance and very good food. The chef is very successful. Food and presentation were very good, we liked all the dishes. 

However service was poor. Staff were arguing among themselves to not help each other. 
At the end of the night, the waiter brought the check but said he forgot to add the wine in the total sum, got the payment with added amount but the restaurant invoice didn‚Äôt show the final sum. We were uncomfortable with that.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Best meal we had in Paris.  Truly exceptional food and service. Every dish was wonderful.  So glad we did this it was literally one of the highlights of our trip.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: This place is a hidden gem. Our group of 9 had such a great experience so we went there two nights in a row.  Raju the general manager runs a well oiled machine.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We enjoyed dinner at the market so much we came back with more people the next night! The food was delicious and the service was excellent.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Awesome restaurant, food, drinks, and staff. Well done!!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Das Essen war hervorragend. In der K√ºche war definitiv jemand, der wei√ü was er tut! Die Geschm√§cker waren inspirierend, der Service sehr aufmerksam, die Auswahl f√ºr glutenfreie Optionen war gut. Ein Empfehlung f√ºr alle die frz.-fusion m√∂gen. Getr√§nkeauswahl gut sortiert. Der Service war hingewandt und sehr aufmerksam. Kommen sehr gerne wieder!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: ein gemeinsamer abend mit freunden, das restaurant ist wundersch√∂n und extrem stylisch. im gegensatz zu vielen restaurants in paris hat man hier mehr als genug platz am und um den tisch! das essen war fantastisch, der service sehr aufmerksam und genau. die preise sind absolut ok. ein besuch lohnt sich!!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Restaurant de qualit√©. Autant les produits que le service ou le cadre. Appr√©ciable pour Le Brunch le dimanche.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: What once was a popular destination has devolved into a waste of time and money.  The menu is no longer imaginative, and the food preparation and service are abysmal.  Just skip it, and look for some place new.  This was beyond disappointing.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Very good food with mediocre service. The crispi rice was excellent pasta with shrimp wow.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Greatest restaurant ever in Paris! We celebrate my husband‚Äôs birthday and have a great night thanks for the great service

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: One of the best meals we had on our stay in Paris. Get the Moulin Rouge cocktail!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent cuisine, wine, and hospitality. Looking forward to visiting again.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Sushi salmon appetizer and drinks were terrific. Chicken entree was overcooked and dry. Salmon with champagne vinegrette Sauce was outstanding. And bread was delicious so fresh. Service good.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Merci encore pour hier c‚Äô√©tait tr√®s gentil de votre part S√©bastien

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Bonjour toujours un plaisir de d√Æner au Market tr√®s bonne √©quipe cuisine excellente un v√©ritable r√©gal Merci S√©bastien David

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Todo muy normal y el predio muy elevado

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
The burger was good, chips a bit cool. My wife had the chicken which arrived as a chicken breast and that was about it. My daughter had the ‚Ç¨33 pizza, which was a bit smaller than a dinner plate. Not great value, you have to order extras to go with your meal,
Make sure you ask what will you receive food wise on your plate. Otherwise your get a lump of chicken..

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Everything wonderful!! Service, food, ambiance‚Ä¶

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great ambience and a beautiful restaurant. The food was fabulous and our server was great.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: This place has to be the surprise of out trip! Great food exceptional service and just all around good! I top pick for anyone in Paris!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Wow this meal made our trip so memorable. Staff were so lovely and accommodating to us and the food was delicious. Shoutout to  Cedric the lovely waiter who served us!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Lovely last minute find on our weekend away in Paris . The staff were so attentive . Food was delicious . They even did a birthday cake for my partner . Would really recommend

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: My overall favorite place in Paris! Ambiance, food and service are wonderful each time!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: MERCI POUR L'ACCUEIL EXCEPTIONNEL COMME TOUJOURS...

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Amazing experience from start to finish. Food was gorgeous and the restaurant itself is modern, clean and classy. Great background music but a lovely atmosphere to chat. Highly recommend a visit if you‚Äôre in Paris!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent all around

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Black Plate and Cucumber Martinis ‚Ä¶well done.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
EL TRATO S√öPER EXCELENTE Y SU COMIDA FABULOSA 
MUY RECOMENDADO

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The food here was fantastic. Our starters were the coconut curry chicken soup which was out of this world. My wife had the octopus which was cooked to perfection and as soft as butter, not overly chewy.  For dinner she had the salmon and I had the Lamb. Bothe were delicious.  Pretty full so we shared this dessert.  It was also fantastic.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We we celebrating a birthday and the Market staff was very accommodating to my requests. Thank you.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: A nice surprise - great quality food. Steak was superb. The starters were really good too

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great food and ambiance

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great food and service

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent food, really and great service. I enjoy this restaurant very much. Staff is available, very polite and welcoming. Not always the case in Paris...

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
La musique est un peu forte 
et l‚Äôentr√©e des calamars frits est excellente avec sa sauce une vraie et agr√©able d√©couverte bravo

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
We ordered 3 starters and we received  only two and one of them wrong .
Nice restaurant

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: My husband and I at here for dinner for our one night in Paris. Everything was exceptional. Definitely one of the best meals we‚Äôve ever had!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Outstanding food, service and experience.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: New Year‚Äôs Day dinner. Beautiful restaurant just off Champs Elysees. Great service and the food was tremendous - had the lamb was cooked to perfection.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
We went for NYE and had the BEST time. Perfect location to view the fireworks at the Arc de Triomphe. The atmosphere of the restaurant was fun, the decorations were beautiful, and the food was fantastic. 

If you plan to spend New Year‚Äôs Eve in Paris, you MUST go to Market!!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Dinner was very expensive, but it was a new year's special menu. Everything else was excelent

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: They didn‚Äôt tell us before our visit that there was a new years eve package. So the only food available was the package that cost ‚Ç¨198.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Celebrated New Years Eve.  Fantastic experience.  Excellent good.  Very good service.  Fun and lively ambiance.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The food quality was indeed very good although a bit too pricy. Overall staff were brilliant. Location was superb

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Das Silvester Men√º ist viel zu √ºberteuert au√üerdem war es eine Abfertigung. Mit sch√∂n sitzen und genie√üen hatte es nicht viel zu tun

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Coconut chicken soup is amazing by taste and we really loved it. This soup recipe is very interesting and I definitely try to incorporate it in my cooking as well.

Fried calamari, very banal and basic as cooked and tasted, but the green sauce with yogurt, cumin, lemon juice and etc is very interesting.

Salmon, well it was skinned (bad!) and tasted as farmed Atlantic poor fish raised in a tank without sunshine and vitamins. üòä Its spice coating and sauce are good, but poor fish structure barely survived defrosting and was mashy. Would send back dish as such in San Francisco.

Parmesan chicken. Well. It's was so dry. Plastic cheap chicken. Disgusting. Shame on the cook. Artichokes were well cooked and in nice sauce.
I was expecting totally different dish. It's was not even comparable to NYC street deli chicken cutlet. Yesterday was New Years eve and I just didn't want to spoil out mood by complaining. But to serve the chicken as such is high crime in culinary industry and sous-chef who is responsible for it should be sentenced to few years in only veggie cutting enclosure.
What you never heard about free range and organic chickens in Paris?

Table near us, one person had Angus Beef hamburger with Russian dressing. Oh boy. Looks so cheap and dry with those ugly fries. Maybe in Paris it's exotic food. lol the French man had to dissect the hamburger and scoop away the meat. I don't blame him, I will do the same. The bun was clearly not eatable.

The tap water somehow comes up as 9++euros on bill and there is a no way to know what they charge for any drinks including water and etc.

I been at Jean-Georges places before and I met the chef at San Francisco Design Center around my former gallery. Definitely below my expectations and won't recommend this place. After all, there are still great restaurants in vicinity in Paris, France to get your palette quite happy about.

Happy New Year üéâ

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Tr√®s bonne adresse. Je recommande le cheesecake vraiment succulent.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: All the staff here are so friendly, they‚Äôre attentive and cannot do enough to make the experience a memorable one. The waiters here made the experience even better as they engaged with us on a personal level and their customer service was first class. The food was exquisite and definitely worth coming back to Paris for! Amazing experience from start to finish, c‚Äôest magnifique!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: This was another last minute reservation and glad I made it.  Was seated at the bar dining area and it was comfortable.Tried the shared black plate for entree and the turbot for main.  Shared black plate was exceptional and the turbot was solid.  Service was as you‚Äôd hope for and my waiter was attentive and always ready. Will be booking again :)

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Excellent food, service level average: 3 mistakes really is too much.
Bad music much too loud.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
‚ÄúA Flavor Bonanza!!‚Äù

We have a fantastic dining experience at Market for our Christmas  celebration. We started off with Tuna tartare, burrata, and the perfectly dressed kale salad. All of the starters were flavorful and the perfect size to share.

At the suggestion of our servers Yelen and Morgane, we chose the lamb chops as our main course and they were incredibly tender and paired perfectly with the mushroom bolognese.

The impeccable service and upbeat atmosphere in the restaurant made for a great family celebration! Yelen and Morgane are very knowledge about their menu and they made the evening so much fun!!!

I highly recommend this restaurant for a special evening.

The ravioli was too firm and a little on the bland side. Some parts of the ricotta was cold, it seemed like it was previously frozen.
The wine was great and Matias, our server was the saving grace.

The ambiance really good a rainy night instagrammable you cabbsay
Thabk you

Text: The service was very slow but the food came out very quickly, not a good sign. Text:

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: It is a pity the service was painfully slow and confused.  We received a menu 12 minutes after seating.  20 minutes later our drink and food order were taken together.  Our cocktails came out 14 minutes after the salad.  The salad sat while we waited for and enjoyed our cocktails.  The main course, as you would expect, was beautifully presented, creative and delicious.  We did not get dessert because our waitress was much too slow and confused.  This was unfortunate because I was looking forward to the passion fruit mousse.  Nothing but Americans here so the vibe is more like Los Angeles.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We were pleasantly surprised when we arrived for our reservation.  The modern soft rock playing over the speakers provided a for an upbeat atmosphere.  The decor is modern.  Great choice of cocktails and I recommend the Cucumber Martini.  Wine selection is good.  The food offers many choices and is very eclectic with fantastic flavors.  Service was excellent!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Visually pleasing restaurant with incredibly slow and inattentive service. Menu is over-priced for small portions of very average food.  We were given a sharing dessert "on the house" as it was our wedding anniversary - only to find that it had been added to our bill when we came to pay (it was only removed from the total when I drew this to the server's attention). Neighbouring table (a mum and child) went to the lavatory and returned to find that their table had been cleared by a trainee waiter. For just over 200 Euros it was a very poor dining experience in a City full of good restaurants.

Text: Dinner was amazing and service was superb and the cheesecake was delicious!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Open table suggest this is a mid price option but it‚Äôs closer to top end. Our meal for 2 was 250 Euros with a single bottle of their cheapest wine. 

You‚Äôll get a top end environment and good service but while the food is very good it just doesn‚Äôt have enough about it  to make it special or justify the prices.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: It was magnificent, thank you for the lovely evening!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Food was excellent along with the service. Don‚Äôt usually leave reviews but this was one of our favorite meals in Paris by far.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Food and service was excellent!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Very underwhelming food. We expected a lot more. The menu is pretty chaotic, and kind of just seems like a random group of items just thrown together.  We ordered 4 dishes from the ‚Äúshareable‚Äù section but for no clear reason they split 2 of these in half and put on separate plates. The tuna tartare was excellent and the ginger sauce was at least a little unique. The ‚Äúcrispy rice‚Äù salmon nigiri was a huge miss in terms of execution but also just didn‚Äôt seem like a good idea anyway. The shrimp salad was fine but the shrimp being hot on a cold salad was also kind of weird, and it clearly would‚Äôve been better chilled. The calamari was also fine but a bit too chewy, and for a restaurant of this supposed caliber I expected way more. The biggest miss by far was the octopus which was pretty bad. Seemed like they boiled it, then fried , then grilled it hard. It was past charred jn spots and instead just tasted burned. 
Food aside, the service was just terrible. Spoke to our waiter 4 times total, and 2 of those we had to flag him down. The bartender actually finally brought us the check after the waiter forgot. I ordered a beer then when I finished it he just took my glass and didn‚Äôt ask if I wanted another. Took 10 minutes to realize he wasn‚Äôt coming back so I went to the bar and ordered a beer.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Tr√®s cher pour la qualit√© des mets
Portions tr√®s l√©g√®res
Th√© servi avec environ 10ml d'eau. Pour 9‚Ç¨ ca fait tr√®s cher la gorg√©e.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: If you are in Paris and want a top class restaurant you must visit here. The food in outstanding as is the service you might think it‚Äôs a little expensive but you get what you pay for. We had the Black Plate to start and it was out of this world. If I lived in Paris I would be a poor man because I‚Äôd eat here all of the time.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Amazing food, pairings, atmosphere, drinks - a must visit!!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Wonderful food and service. We brought our kids and the staff was very attentive.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Love this restaurant!! If in Paris it is well worth making time time to dine here! The food is excellent and the service some of the best in Paris.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Such a disappointment! I have been to Market a few years ago and this visit was nothing like the previous one. Our waiter only spoke to us when we ordered and when he inquired about dessert. Although the inside of the restaurant only had guests at 4 other tables, the service was extremely deficient. The food was pretty good but not what you‚Äôd expect from Jean Georges.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent service. The food was very good -- we thoroughly enjoyed our meal.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Complete tourist trap.  Avoid at all cost.  We were seated promptly and waited about 15 minutes with menus closed on the table for our waiter to visit the even though there were only about six tables in the upstairs dining room.  I ordered Tuna Tartare for a starter and the Duck for my entree.  Portions were small but the sauces were excellent, by far the most impressive aspect of the meal.  My wife ordered Gazpacho to start and the Risotto.  Again, the sauce was the star.  My teenage daughter ordered a pizza.  When asked how it was, she replied ‚Äúit‚Äôs alright‚Äù‚Ä¶a 14 year old food critic who nailed the chefs performance in as few words as possible.  If we hadn‚Äôt suffered through enough mediocrity, we dared to order desserts.  This is where I was shocked and appalled beyond words; I ordered the chocolate cake after inquiring about the ‚ÄúCrepe Br√ªl√©e‚Äù and not being impressed in the slightest with the description‚Ä¶my wife ordered the Pavlova.  The chocolate cake arrived and to my horror, I had just received a Chocolate Lava Cake that you might expect to get at TGI Fridays for bargain price of 16 Euros.  You‚Äôve got to be absolutely kidding me.  The chef should be embarrassed to serve anything like that in a city with what are arguably some of the best patisseries on the planet right around the corner from his front door; and for 16 Euros besides.  Absolutely shameful.  My wife took a few bites out of the Pavlova and was thoroughly unimpressed.  I tasted it and although it wasn‚Äôt terrible, it certainly was less than memorable.  We waited another fifteen minutes after the table had been cleared before hailing the waiter for the check.  So, in short: service - mediocre, food - okay, sauces - excellent, desserts - a disgrace.  I would not dine here again if you paid me nor would I recommend to anyone.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The services was good. The manager always checking on the service and good.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges

Text: The poor service drove the overall rating down. Really, really bad service.  Food was, at best, good, but both salads were overdressed.  Clientele was near 100% from the U.S. which tells me the locals don‚Äôt place much value here.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: I have been at Market several times before the Pandemic. This time it was a good experience, but fell a little behind in expectations. Menu was not as innovative as in the past. Wine BTG with very few options. Service was attentive by the server.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Incredible!!! Traveling from the states and this far this is our favorite spot. Food was superb, our waiter was very attentive to detail, noticing our wine bottle wasn‚Äôt chilled enough he sent it back then proceeded to keep it at the perfect temperature all night long! Very friendly, cool space, welcoming of us Americans with our poor French. Can‚Äôt recommend this more!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Food and service Was excellent! A bit pricey

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: This place is unbelievable. Only drawback and I mean only drawback is it doesn‚Äôt have a view of the Eiffel Tower or some other landmark. The Burrata with Fruit and the crab cake starters were incredible. Main course options were plentiful and the desserts should not be passed up.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Compliments to the chef, I don't eat mushrooms and last night I had two of the most delicious dishes I have ever had and both had mushrooms in them. I could not believe my taste buds!! Fantastic staff as well, friendly, attentive to detail and great communication.  Market will be a must go anytime we visit Paris!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Underwhelming and extremely overpriced! 29 euros for bland tomato linguini and 70 euros for a starter platter with nothing special! We left after 40 minutes feeling utterly disappointed. The decor and music were pretentious  and the waiters completely inattentive who just focused on rushing us to order. Not worth it when in Paris - a city full of amazing restaurants.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: First time to Paris, so nothing better to dine at a Jean-Georges restaurant. Great location and walking distance to the Champs E lysees‚Ä¶Fun & friendly staff

Text:

Text: I was looking for a high quality meal relatively close to my hotel and found this restaurant on OpenTable. Next time I‚Äôm in  Paris I will absolutely return. The quality of the food was outstanding with absolutely perfect presentation. I especially recommend the ‚Äúcrepes br√ªl√©e‚Äù for dessert. It had multiple layers of crepe, each covered in a thin coating of custard, served with an apricot reduction sauce.

Text: Service un peu lent mais tr√®s attentionn√© et aimable

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We ate at Market on consecutive evenings this week.  This first night was our 4 year Anniversary and it was excellent.  The people are warm and inviting, smiling and laughing.  Our meals were excellent with the turbot and chicken breast as entree‚Äôs and a nice bottle of wine.  The next night was our last in Paris and we were able to get a table at Market!  It was even better!  We started with the Black Plate and it was absolutely amazing!  The salad was so good my wife ordered it as a main and we split that with the risotto.  Coupled with a beautiful Chateau Margaux, and you have another perfect evening!

Text: Loved the atmosphere and the food

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Jean-Georges should be embarrassed‚Äî I came in thrilled and left horrified. Simply put, the chef needs to learn how to cook a steak medium rare, something that is honed at the age of 10.
Hey it happens, I get it ‚Äî but they took my steak back, threw it under the broiler and reserved me the same steak??UNACCEPTABLE!  For Jean-Georges?   An average restaurant that would be closed in 6 months in NYC.  Don‚Äôt bother

Text: Superb location in central Paris and excellent service from the staff. Exceptional food.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The food was truly wonderful and the service appropriate for a restaurant of its caliber.  But we were seated near a party of about 16-20 people who were celebrating something.  They were loud.  And their noise was supplemented by percussive piped in music.  Plus the architecture heightened the noise: lots of wood walls and glass windows, tiled floor with no carpet. This drift into US bad-hospitality culture in a restaurant created by Jean-Georges Vongerichten in France is sad.  We'd like to go back, the food and wine was so good, and the staff tried to make our visit pleasant.  But we need to know that changes have been made.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We came to visit Paris for vacation and came to Market based on online reviews and the ability to book a reservation. The food was DELICIOUS!!! The ambiance was sexy with the dimmed lights and good music. The service was excellent! We had salmon, a crab cake, calamari, the angus burger, shrimp salad, warm chocolate cake with ice cream, and the lemon ginger cake and sorbet! You will not be disappointed with your meal or dining environment.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Delicious food, great cocktails, staff made wonderful wine recommendation. A little pricey but overall wonderful experience.

Der Artischocken Salat mit Avocado f√ºr 17 Euro eine glatte Unversch√§mtheit. Die Black Plate - eine Vorspeiseplatte f√ºr 2 Personen ( f√ºr 68,- EUR) unterirdisch. Eine Kombination aus Sushi, Samosa, Garnelen und 2 weiteren Rollen - insgesamt 16 Teile / 8 pro Person- geschmacklich ein absoluter Reinfall und preislich nichts anderes als Nepp. 

Die Bedienung macht ihre Sache gut  - nach der Zufriedenheit der G√§ste zu fragen verbietet sich - so jedenfalls beim Ober der uns bedient hat - wohl der Anstand - angesichts des wahrscheinlichen Bewusstseins dass die G√§ste hier abgezockt werden.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Service was slow. Filet of beef could not be cut with a steak knife. Was looking forward to this restaurant based on reviews. Disappointing outcome.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Extremely pleasant evening, nice atmosphere,  very good food and service. Loved the chevice, while the meat main courses are not as exceptional as the starters. Desserts outstanding. The only flaw: quite expensive.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We are visiting Paris and found this place on open table because it was near our hotel and so glad we did. The food and service were excellent. We enjoyed it so much we had to go back again the next night.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Our dinners were delicious, service was great!  Our server was extremely attentive and helpful, even stepping outside with us as we left to direct us to the Champs Elysees.  It was a delightful dinner!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We had such a great time at Market. It was our first day in Paris and our first trip since COVID and they could not have been more welcoming. Rami, our server was incredible - such great energy and gave us the best menu suggestions - the meal was amazing! Thank you Market and Rami for making our first night in Paris so enjoyable!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Tres bein!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent service, very good food with a voice of simple dishes or more elaborate ones.    Great come back.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The service was truly impeccable!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
This lunch was organised for a colleague retiring from our firm after 30 years of service.
The table was nicely situated and the food delicious.
Everyone was very happy.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great dining experience‚Ä¶..amazing service.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: La service √©tait correcte et sympa.  Les entr√©es, les plats et les desserts √©taient sans exception tr√®s faibles: un tartare de thon inond√© par trop de sauce et √©videmment ne pas fait par couteau; un filet de b≈ìuf trop cuit (m√™me apr√®s une commande de cuisson  ‚Äútr√®s saignante‚Äù); des raviolis secs et insipides; une tarte √† cerises √©videmment fait avec ce que les am√©ricains dit ‚Äúpie filler‚Äù avec une glace de pistache qui a le go√ªt et un couleur ‚Äúindustriel‚Äù.  Mais le pire √©tait une pomme pur√©e digne d‚Äôun d√©jeuner de mon √©cole anglais.  Dommage - le soir faisait beau et la service √©tait correcte et sympa mais la carte manque d‚Äôimagination et le repas / cuisine ne vaut pas la visite.  A √©viter.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Now that Paris is opening up again, this was a pleasant way to enjoy Friday evening.  The maitre de chef was prompt and attentive and the food was very good. Some clever ideas on spacing (using some bushes) to allow acceptable distances between tables.  Thank you!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: A little on the expensive side, lovely outdoors, very tasty food and extra nice staff. Located in a beautiful area.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: joli cadre et carte sympathique avec de nombreuses options

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
I am a regular customer of this restaurant (since 2005) precisely and whenever I go there with a friend, male or female, that discovers the place and the food served with the upmost quaity of service and smile, they key in this magical address in their smartphone. 
Highly recommended for their savvy wine list too.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Best restaurant ever

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great find not too far from the Champs d'Elysee.  They didn't offer the brunch due to the vacation period but we found excellent entree and main course choices.  Service was very good, the waiters were attentive and polite.  Loved our meals and the ambiance.  Will definitely go back to explore the brunch.  Highly recommend.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Nice food and service

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: An exceptional meal with excellent service we felt like VIPs. The cooking is incredible, creative, fresh, full of flavour. It is the one restaurant we will always return to whenever we come to Paris. Complete perfection! Thank you.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Wonderful terrasse
Pizzas in the menu are a great choice for children.
Delicious Asian starters

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Our dinner was an event! We arrived a bit early for our reservation and the host had a perfect table picked for us. We started with two perfect cocktails and the tuna tartare. All wonderful. We then shared the mozzarella + basil pizza. So good. We got excellent wine recommendations and ordered our mains. My husband had the sea bream which he said was outstanding. I had the steak. Very good, though it wasn't cooked at medium rare. It came out medium. But it wasn't terrible. I still enjoyed the meat. We ended with desserts and a drink on the patio. Service was stellar all night. Waiters are masked for safety. We would highly recommend. Expensive, but worth it. A perfect spot for our intimate Anniversary dinner.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
On y mange toujours tr√®s bien.  Je ne comprends pas que Market ne figure pas au Michelin.
La disparition du menu le rend cher (2 plats, 1 dessert ,2 caf√©s ,1 bouteille de vin, eau en carafe = 150 ‚Ç¨) 
Mais on  reviendra

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Rien d‚Äôextraordinaire au vue du prix, la r√©servation √©tait pour l‚Äôanniversaire de ma fille. Nous avons d√Æner et en fin de repas nous n‚Äôavons pas pris de dessert juste un caf√© (r√©servation pour 5) et l√†, la serveuse nous ram√®ne un dessert sans que l‚Äôon demande avec une bougie üëçsympa je me dis et quand je vois l‚Äôaddition on nous a factur√© le dessert je trouve cela 
limite....üòü

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges

Text:
Once upon a time Market was one of the ‚Äúmusts‚Äù in Paris.

Food below average. Fries soggy. Tables and chairs tired. 
It‚Äôs time to move on!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Sehr teuer und nur durchschnittliche Qualit√§t. Nicht zu empfehlen.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Good vibe in the 8th. Risotto was outstanding. Great service.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Les plats sont bons mais le confort n‚Äôest pas au top... il faisait froid et les banquettes sont √† changer.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Food was excelent  with great service from the staff.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Amazing food and atmosphere. Highly recommend

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Not a great place to be service really average and food as well.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: amazing as always

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges

Service parfait, une cuisine excellente.
Un restaurant qui vaut le d√©tour, nous avons pass√© une tr√®s bonne soir√©e.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
