Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Delicious. All the food was splendid

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: I had a nice dinner in Market. The place is well decorated, furnished, with lot of spaces, perfectly located. Buratta to start was good but you can find better one in Paris if you like the best creamy buffala. I enjoyed my tuna tartare with a very good ginger sauce.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Valentines night

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Tout etait super, restaurant parfait je recommande.
Merci au chef de rang Rami pour le service

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent restaurant in Paris, definitely will be visiting again! Best tuna tartar I ever had.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Simply perfect, from arrival to the last 'Have a good evening'. Awesome experience through all senses. Thank you!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Friendly welcome. Attentive staff. Very quick (too quick) service of food. My entr√©e was three samosas on a plate which was too small (in my opinion, with a dip, but no garnish, very tasty though. My filet of turbot was placed on whole glac√© carrots, which I thought could have been better, but well cooked fish and tasty. Good atmosphere with modern lounge music and the tables are well spread out. Overall very good, but just missing the five star rating from me.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Service wasn‚Äôt great, but everyone in the restaurant was very nice. Food was delicious! Would definitely go back in the future.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Nous venons souvent et nous aimons la qualit√© de l'ensemble mais aussi  ce qui correspond au mots  de Charlie Chaplin " Simplicity is no simple thing"

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Lovely evening with friends - very friendly, lovely food, great atmosphere

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: 10/10 everything, I would highly recommend Market  if you are visiting Paris for a weekendüòä

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great food ... Great ambience !

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: This restaurant is located in a very secured  affluent neighborhood. The service is top notch. The food is remarkable! I‚Äôd definitely recommend if visiting France. Please make a reservation.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: It was excellent in every single way. Loved it!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great service and food.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges

Text:

The only downside was that wine choice was a little limited if you only wanted a glass rather than a bottle

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The truffle pizza was to die for! Our favorite restaurant while in Paris. We went twice in one week. No cold-shoulder attitude here.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: New Years Eve dinner at Market was excellent in every way.  The special menu, the service, the atmosphere.  My only regret is that Market is not close to my home so that we could dine here regularly.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We had the new year eve set meals.  Everything is great. The passion fruit souffl√© is surprisingly delicious.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Todo muy bien

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Not all the Japanese style food was good. Otherwise a decent restaurant.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: I ate beef steak, lt was so good! I llke steak's source, it was so delicious!!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Overpriced and thoughtless menu. Mediocre service for restaurant in this price range. Style over substance. Avoid if you can.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Good food. Nice place to eat. Slightly overpriced

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
I went to Market twice during my stay in Paris and the service was so amazing. 

Everyone was so lovely and friendly and really went out of their way to make me feel comfortable, especially more so the first time as I was dining alone. That time the waitress was super sweet and made conversation and was super personable, as was the hostess, who remembered me when I came back later in the week with a friend.

The second time I came the service was great, although I would say that the waiter was pushing for a tip and mentioned adding service, which we would have done anyway with prompting, as I noticed the first time service is not included and rounded my bill up, so I would say this ruined it a bit, as it made it feel like the only reason he was nice was to get a tip. But apart from that it was once again lovely and our drinks were topped up without asking and everyone was so smiley and willing to help.

Lovely ambiance and lovely food. Beautiful restaurant.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We had a beautiful lunch in fantastic surroundings - love the decor and presentation and the lamb chops were amazing

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Le cadre est plut√¥t cosy, l'accueil parisien (professionnel mais pas chaleureux), la carte est fournie, les prix √©lev√©s. Nos voisins et voisines sont bruyants... nous parvenons difficilement √† nous entendre avec mon ami. Nous mangeons vite : moi mon hamburger (pas mal) et lui les St Jacques √† la plancha. Notre nouveau serveur est plus que sympathique, nous papotons, il nous offre le caf√©. Le restaurant a 2 avantages comparatifs : il est plut√¥t bien situ√© et il est ouvert le lundi soir.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Food was great, very nice place and food service

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Couldn‚Äòt recommend it more! Food was more than delicious! 100% worth a visit when staying in paris.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Our family celebrated Thanksgiving at Market and we all thoroughly enjoyed it. The variety of the menu and the food itself was outstanding As we don‚Äôt particularly care for the traditional Thanksgiving meal this was the best dinner ever for our crew. The atmosphere is lovely and the service was impeccable. So hope we will someday return!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great food, service and location

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: I took my family for a brunch on a rainy Saturday and the staff has been just amazing, very welcoming and attentive. They let us stay there till quiet late without making us feel uncomfortable. I definitely recommend and look forward to going back to Paris to go here for dinner.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Fabulous food. Great service especially since we were probably the last table sat and last to leave. Delicious!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Accueil et service absolument charmant . Cela √©tant , rapport qualit√© prix exag√©r√©, les plats un peu d√©cevants . Dessert parfait en revanche

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Market was an excellent experience from the quality the food, to the quality of the service as well as the ambience. One of the best meals we had while we were visiting Paris.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Delicios el restaurante un excelente servicio vale la pena muchisisisimo !!!

Text:
Les plats sont  bons, comme dans mon souvenir, avec une mention sp√©ciale pour les assaisonnements qui sont toujours r√©ussis. 
En revanche, le personnel au service n‚Äôest pas √† la hauteur. Lenteur pour prendre notre commande de boissons, pas un mot de La serveuse qui nous a apport√© nos coupes. Seul un des serveurs a √©t√© √† la hauteur, pr√©sent mais discret et aimable. 
Manque d‚Äôambiance √©galement par rapport au souvenir que j‚Äôavais de ce restaurant.

Text: Qualit√© des produits, service moyen, temp√©rature en hiver inacceptable, il faisait tr√®s froid. La temp√©rature est insuffisante et nous avions une table pr√®s de la fen√™tre. Revenir au Printemps et en √©te.

Text:
Ein sehr leckeres Essen in sch√∂ner Atmosph√§re. Gute Auswahl an Vor und Hauptspeisen mit sehr guten Desserts. 
Mein Favorit ist der warme Schokokuchen. 
Der Service war √ºberaus freundlich und zuvorkommend   
Wir kommen wieder

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: From the front door we were greeting warmly.  Decor was lovey and the food  prepared by the chef was delicious .  I enjoyed the chicken dish and my dinner guest , my grandson, had the lamb chops. We followed up with a drink at the bar and surprised with a lovely birthday dessert!!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Me pareci√≥ un ambiente muy agradable y la decoraci√≥n muy moderna y bonita. La ubicaci√≥n buena, cerca de rue st honore.

La  comida me encanto: de entrada una pizza de trufa y de plato fuerte el salmon, ambos platos exquisitos.

Me atendi√≥ un mesero turco muyamable y atento

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Outstanding service and fantastic food!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Good food, quiet, good service.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Location is excellent and restaurant is very beautiful‚Ä¶ Starters were fantastic and everyone commented on how good they were especially the tuna tartar and the various sampler items‚Ä¶

The only drawback where the mains all were a bit overcooked probably to appease more international/American taste but everyone thought that their dishes should‚Äôve been a bit more on the rare side.  There were also a few comments about things being a bit salty which again is probably to please a more international/American palette‚Ä¶ I would still go to this restaurant again as the overall experience was very nice

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Perfection
Lovely s

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Very good as always

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Me and my partner celebrated our anniversary here. We were met with a warm welcome and still able to get a nice table whilst we were running late all the staff ensured we were accounted for especially Theo! And the lady that took our jackets and photos of us after our meal (didn‚Äôt get her name). Overall a wonderful ambience and the food was great salmon cooked to perfection we even got a complimentary cheesecake with a candle lit which really made me and my partner smile thank you for giving us a new memory and a place to visit next time we head to paris. Thank you all

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Absolutely love it. Highly recommend it. Great choice of food; excellent quality and very good service. Not cheap but well worth it

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We throughly enjoyed the restaurant. The ambience, food, and service was outstanding. We went twice in one week

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: It was our last night in Paris.  We were looking for an extraordinary experience.  We found it at Market.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Best burger in Paris!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Service, location were great. We were there for our 10th anniversary. They also acknowledged it by a really delicious dessert. The only thing didn‚Äôt meet the expectation was the French fries. It looked and tasted like it had been bought from a supermarket. Anything else tasted reaaally delicious. Love it.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We are Market regulars. We love their food and service. This most recent visit was clearly an ‚Äòoff day‚Äô. We were largely ignored, never had bread service, shrimp was under cooked, we were overcharged for food.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Beautiful restaurant but the food missed the mark.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Fabulous meal and service, beautiful decor. Highly recommend.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The staff was so friendly and courteous. My wife and I were celebrating our anniversary here and our food was absolutely incredible. Great ambiance and worth the visit.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: A faire en couple ou entre coll√®gue. Plats simples et tr√®s savoureux. Le service est impeccable.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: My wife and I very much enjoyed everything about this restaurant that we were referred to in celebration of our wedding anniversary. The ambiance, decor and of course food were exactly what we had hoped for. The service was outstanding and very attentive to our needs including my gluten intolerance. Would most certainly visit them again.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Always excellent! Reliable, comfortable eating solo; good food.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We had dinner here for our last night in Paris to celebrate our engagement and my fianc√©‚Äôs birthday. The food was amazing! The service was great as well. I asked them last minute to sing happy birthday to my fianc√© with dessert and they did! The quality of food and service for the price was right. Couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better last night. Thank you!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Loved the modern take on french food at Market.  The ambience is perfect for a nite out and the pricing is reasonable for a restaurant of this quality.  We could not say enough about the service and perfect wine recommendation.  Highly recommend Market if you are visiting Paris.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great experience overall, wide menu variety in a wonderful part of town.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Celebrated my wife‚Äôs birthday in Paris at Market.  Food and service were top notch.  Each plate was fantastically prepared and the service was great from beginning to end. Would certainly return.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Nice menu, good service. Food was great. Ambience of the place is lovely and it‚Äôs a great location.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Market had a beautiful ambience, service and amazing food. I truly enjoyed my meal and the service and on my next visit to Paris I will be back.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We had a great experience. Classic Jean-Georges. Michelin caliber dining. This restaurant closely resembles Jean-Georges‚Äô Nougatine and ABC Kitchen in New York.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great Food, friendly service. One course we ordered was forgotten, which shortened pur stay a bit.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Had a lovely dinner and bottle of wine. The sommelier helped us pick out a  delicious bottle of wine and the waitstaff were attentive. The ceviche and tuna tartare were highlights!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: we were on a weekend getaway and this crossed my open table feed. it‚Äôs was great and we were thrilled..def would go back every time i‚Äôm in paris!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Birthday
Nice surprise by staff 
Really appreciate it 
Great commitment and focus

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We live in the 8th and Market is our go-to for special occasions, visiting friends and family or date night. The black plate is always excellent and the service is friendly as well as immaculate.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: This was our favorite restaurant so far in Paris! The tuna appetizer and other items were awesome! See the pictures!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Bread was hard and dry. Seemed stale and it was late night. The burger meat  didn‚Äôt have any flavor or salt pepper or anything thankfully the fixings did. The desserts was the best part of the meal. The cheesecake and the poached pear was delicious. The ambiance was nice and service was good.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Unfortunately the bathroom  has bad odors and smells bad.
It is necessary clean it plus frequently and check leaks odors.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Food was delicious. Service was very disappointing for a restaurant of this caliber and price point. They attempted to serve our main course before the appetizer we had ordered, they attempted to serve us cocktails that were ordered by another table, and the glass of wine ordered to have with our meal did not arrive until we were finished eating. For an apology, the restaurant did not charge us for the late glass of wine, and offered us a nice bowl of fresh berries at no charge. While the comped wine and fruit were appreciated, better service would have been desired and expected, and would have earned a 5-star raring

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Service was very professional, food was also very good except for the octopus, which was like a ‚Äúrubber‚Äù.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Very sad. Pretty place. Food interesting and good. They delivered two dishes to us in error. Ran Out of many items on menu. Service unbelievably slow and inattentive. Maybe a one time thing but lots of items dropped or knocked over, like ice bucket with wine bottle, plates, etc.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: It was my first French dinner in Paris. The place, food and service were great.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Ambience was friendly and sophisticated

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The deserts were amazing, however the black plate for two was average and not worth it at 64 Euros, whilst the nachos with guacamole for 19 Euros definitely left us feeling Lille we have been taken for a ride. The portion was tiny and absolutely no different from Chipotle. I love JG restaurants and in Ny they managed to make even the Cezar salad memorable. It‚Äôs an overpriced restaurant riding on a good name. The service was excellent and we are grateful to the staff!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We loved Market and had a wonderful time! The food was great - we had the peppered steak and the ravioli and both were very good (also, coming from an expensive area of the states, we found the prices to be extremely reasonable). I also wanted to give a special shoutout to our server who was really friendly - I speak decent French, but was translating for my boyfriend, and our server was super patient.  Overall, excellent experience! We would definitely come back.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: You want to try something different, this is the place for you! No matter what is ordered, it will be light.  French fusion is the best description.   Definitely was worth the experience but a bit overpriced

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Wonderful meal.  Furst came here 12 years ago on a prior trip.  Didn‚Äôt disappoint.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Family Vacation

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
There are some fabulous standout dishes, as noted by our waiter (Idris, who was a pleasure and spot on with his wine selections). We ordered them and he was right. 
1) dorado sashimi appetizer
2) salad with shrimp in a champagne hollandaise type sauce
3) sea bream in a wonderful broth of cherry tomatoes and root vegetables
4) parmesan crusted chicken breast in a lemony creamy sauce
5) for the cherry on top, the passion fruit sorbet is so amazing and unique. It was cooked to perfection. The accompanying homemade passion fruit sorbet  also perfect, not too sweet, very intense flavor.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Came in late one night on our final day in Paris and had a lovely meal ; most certainly not the traditional French fare, an Asian riff through everything.  The asparagus with shredded egg and the shrimp salad were fantastic dishes, the tuna spring roll very nice if somewhat derivative.  Service for midnight was exemplary, our wonderful waiter was courteous and informative and definitely helped us pick the right dishes for our mood.  The highlight however was the passion fruit souffle we had for dessert, it was out of this world.  Recommended!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Wonderful, every aspect.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great place with excellent food, duck breast is amazing.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Wonderful restaurant in Paris!! The food and service were excellent. Beautiful restaurant in a nice area. Only gripe was smokers allowed outside, but c‚Äôest la vie in Paris I suppose! Overall a wonderful meal!!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: I hate to be critical of restaurants, but do no go.  They tried, but they did not have the experience or training to execute.  The food and service was very ‚Äúamateurish.‚Äù

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Beautiful spot in a luxurious Paris neighborhood. Service was perfect, food was delicious. Not exceptionally creative and a bit pricey but, overall, a really great experience.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We arrived and the restaurant was empty.  Friendly and quick service, but the price was not nearly equal to the product.  I ordered two lamb chops for 36 euro and it was over half unedible fat.  We ordered a crabcake for 24 euro and it was not enough for 1/2 a person.  We were extremely disappointed and are unlikely to use OpenTable again. This was to be our Honeymoon dinner and market ruined it.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Food was expensive and not tasty
Service was very good though

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Lovely meal, one of my favrourite reliable restaurants in Paris.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Terrible service.  Everyone in the restaurant was complaining about the service and they do nothing. Food was just ok. Nothing great especially for the price.  Would not recommend

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Merci Alice and Warren! Delicious and great service.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: A wasted meal in Paris.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Graduation celebration

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Just as I imagined as an American chef in Paris (with his family)

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Food was ok, wine was excellent, service was not good at all. Waited over 20 minutes just to get water and the waiting just continued from there. Had to ask three times for more water and never received our coffee. Finally the bill was wrong and took awhile to get it fixed.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent service and food. Equivalent to 5 star steak house in USA.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: A forlorn outpost of a wordclass chef.   Menu items out but not informed ahead of time.   Appetizer over cooked and should never have left kitchen.  Waitress was impatient and not sincerely unapologetic.  Manager was kind and attentive and tried to save situation, but embarrassing for an establishment of such a well known chef.  Clearly eye has been taken off the ball.  Needs thorough revisit in quality of cooking and attention to service.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Es war einfach zu heiss, da aufgrund der Hitzewelle die Temparaturen extrem hoch waren in Paris. Die K√ºhkungsanlage im Restaurant aber keine Chance hatte...

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Nous avons voulu tester le brunch , et ce dernier est extr√™mement copieux. Cadre simple mais charmant , et service attentionn√© . Recommande fortement.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Paris was  extremely hot and the AC was not working...
Horrible experience

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Good, not great.  Too few waiting staff. Decent food but not special (considering it is Paris). Staff are really nice, as is ambience. Shame they couldn‚Äôt get service right when busy.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
I put this in the system as a special occasion.
Nobody even mentioned it.
Service was slow when we arrived as no one came near the table for ten minutes. The waiter then lost the order and came back 15 minutes after we ordered to retake the order.
Overall food was good but not very impressed.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Fantastic food, great service and a lovely restaurant. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a great dinner.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Wonderful food, service, ambiance, etc.  Just what we were looking for in Paris!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Best meal we‚Äôve had in Paris

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: If I lived in Paris the Market would be my weekly dining experience. Excellent food, service and atmosphere. The location is great as well, next door to Christie‚Äôs.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: A favorite when in Paris

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Father day visit

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Good food and beautiful restaurant.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Expensive but very worth it. Waiters (in typical French fashion) were inattentive, though. I tried to signal, on two different occasions, a waiter, as we had not been seen by one 20 minutes after arriving. The man who showed up to our table ended up serving as our waiter even though he was not one. He was extremely kind. He made the experience better, otherwise we would have left because no one seems to care about serving our table besides him.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: My wife and I had dinner at Market on a Saturday night.  It is located in a nice area and the restaurant's decor is quite nice and unique for a Parisian restaurant.  The tables were far enough apart that you didn't feel like you were too crowded together like other restaurants.  The drinks were well prepared and the food was spot on.  When we asked to finish our bottle of wine with dessert outside, they were kind enough to move us without hesitation.  I highly recommend Market and we will be returning the next time we are in Paris!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Amazingly tasty meal. The turbot was best ever.  Service was impeccable, too.  Nice ambiance. Will make this our standard in Paris. Highly recommend.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
We sat there and were not spoken to by anyone for over 45 minutes. People who came in after us were seeved while we still sat there waiting to get our drink orders. 

Terrible experience. We usually love Jean-Georges. He is one of our favorites. 

Very disappointing!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The food was very high quality.  Service was great but you pay for the quality and service.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Way to expensive for what you get. Loud. Also the service was slow. Food was ok.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Nous sommes venu pour l‚Äôanniversaire de mon copain, une √©quipe g√©niale et serviable

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Food was cold and over cooked. Service took 45m for water

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: High quality food, friendly staff and nice ambiance. Price quality ratio is good.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Very attentive service, friendly staff, multi-lingual and of course creative and tasty dishes that offer unique takes on classic cuisine.  One of the best pieces of beef I've ever had in France.  Excellent wine list to choose from.  Normally would expect to pay significantly more for the location and quality of food and service, so excellent value here.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Muy buena opcion

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great meal tucked away off Champs

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Lovely location, beautiful setting and delicious food. Perfect for a romantic evening in Paris!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Wonderful like always

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great food and atmosphere

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We were in the Champs-Elys√©es area shopping and found this on Open Table. A bit of a walk but a great find! More American than French in that they served good liquor in decent sizes ( something we have not found much of here) and butter immediately with the bread! Lol-comforts of ‚Äúhome‚Äù! The food was unique and delicious. Try the seasonal souffl√©!! We had passion fruit souffl√© with mango ice cream or sorbet. Wow! The waitress says it changes with the season. I told her we‚Äôd be back next season for the next! Not inexpensive but nice. And all of the patrons were dressed nicely too!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Todo excelente, el pato estaba mal cocinado

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Told them we were celebrating a big birthday. They surprised us with a wonderful cheese cake. Really good service.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We had an absolutely wonderful dinner. Quality of food excellent, service by Adrien was superb and very friendly. a great experience!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Finally a restaurant in Paris with space between tables.  Hope more restaurants take that into consideration.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Amazing food, amazing service, cocktails were great. Came here to celebrate a special occasion with my girls and will definitely come back...

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great staff! Very friendly and accommodating. Nice continuation of the Jean George Brand.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: We celebrates our wedding anniversary. The personnel was so polite, food was great, service was perfect. They also surprised us with a small cake because of our anniversary which was so kind.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Nonplussed by this restaurant.  The presentation was nice, but the food itself was just so-so.  The carrots in the roasted baby veggies we‚Äôre absolutely without flavor.  The lamb was quit fatty and had minimal flavor.  The duck was also mediocre.  Would not go again and would not recommend.  If it was one dish that was off I‚Äôd try again, but both dishes being poor makes me say it‚Äôs just not worth the money.  Two simple meals and a salad was over $100.  This was not a $100 meal, even by Paris standards.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: One of the very best  restaurants we have ever been in Paris. Well done!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Food was great. Service was good an friendly. Neither of us spoke french, but that was not a problem. Cool and hip location.  Locals and travelers a like were dinning.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: My husband and I dined while visiting Paris from the States. The restaurant was fabulous, accommodated us with English menus and all the staff spoke English as well. The food and service was fabulous. Would definitely recommend.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent! Everything was awesome!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: A bustling restaurant on Ave Matignon in Paris. It‚Äôs been years since this reservation and I STILL think about this meal and this experience with a smile on my face. Excellent restaurant, if you want luxury dining at a relatively reasonable price do not hesitate to choose Market.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The place is so cool and modern. The prices are expensive but worth it. Rajoo the manager, was very kind and friendly! He gave us to deserts complimentary! Also the waiter Agis (dont know if its correct) was super friendly and servicable. Highly recommend this place!!!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excited  restaurant

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The last time we were in Paris was in 2012 and we ate at (and loved) Market on that trip. We were a little nervous when we arrived this time to find the place quite empty, but the food and service and charm were all still as great as we remembered. It may have just been an off night but if it is one of the places that is not seen as ‚Äúhot‚Äù right now, we‚Äôd urge tourists and Parisians alike to take advantage of available reservations!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Always a pleasure to be there: good location with parking lot right across the street; smooth reservation, friendly and professional reception; tables set allowing space in a quiet and well designed ambiance. Service is fairly rapid and waiters generaly attentionate. Food perfect for business and friendly lunch/diner.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Amazing food, cocktails and wine. Staff was very knowledgeable when it came to ordering wine by the bottle. They gave great recommendations for both cocktails and wine. The food was superb. Would come back here to eat next time we‚Äôre in Paris.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: A great experience as usual. I have been visiting Market for three years now and it is always great. The staff are very friendly and welcoming and the food is excellent.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Amazing servixe

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great food, and amazing service

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Phenomenal food and very friendly and attentive staff, who were also sweet to our toddler.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The food was so delicious, the service was fabulous and the location is amazing. We can‚Äôt wait to go back.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Lunch: Sat us with an English menu! Fresh, creative, outstanding flavors! Friendly service! Don‚Äôt forget dessert!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Encore un merveilleux moment pass√© au Market !

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: TERRIBLE!  Been before and was excited for a repeat visit. How wrong we were to get our hopes up. Food was either cold or over cooked.  But we could not get it replaced because nobody was around to help us. No drinks refreshed, no questions about how the meal was, not even anyone to clear the table when we were done, until we asked. Spoke with the manager to let him know about the issues. He then talked to the server who developed a HUGE attitude. She culminated the evening by telling me she did not like me complaining and ‚Äúyou are nothing to me‚Äù and ‚Äúyou are a liar‚Äù.  Just what you expect when you go out to dinner, never mind at a Jean-George restaurant!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent all around. We went twice in same week while visiting Paris!  Sommelier knows what he is doing.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
While in Paris, we didnt want another rich meal. :) Market was outstanding in every respect..food, service and the food. The food was creative, simple yet perfectly complicated, the atmosphere was modern, yet warm ..and the service was outstanding.
I did not realize it was Jean Georges, now I know why it was perfect. üòò

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
we will come back again ‚Ä¶ :‚Äî)

and that means a lot

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Birthday bash was awesome

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: This is my 4th visit to Market since moving to Paris in January. It is by far my favorite restaurant in Paris. The service is amazing, the black plate is always perfection and I want to eat their bread every single day. My only complaint is that I ordered the cheesecake with candied quince and cassis ice cream. I received berries and strawberry ice cream instead of candied quince and cassis ice cream.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Thank you Market for another amazing dining experience.  After enjoying Market on Christmas Eve and an impromptu visit to Paris, I wanted to share this restaurant with a friend.  I was surprised when our waiter asked if the previous guest  who is a vegetarian was visiting this time.   Her enthusiasm and graciousness was evident the entire evening, as were others who assisted.  The appetizers were spectacular and we went right to dessert and more champagne.  Thank you for a dinner we will remember and appreciate.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Tolles Restaurant. Pers√∂nliche Atmosph√§re. Kreative Karte. Sympathischer Service.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
A great experience 
Staff couldn‚Äôt be more welcoming and food was delicious. Tuna Tartare was soooooo delicious!!!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Black plate is amazing! This is my 3rd time enjoying the black plate and it never disappoints. Service is perfection. And they even spoke English, which exceeded all expectations

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The food was delicious if a bit pricey incredible dessert!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Very pleasant!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The food the service Everything was perfect, thank you very much..

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Great environment and terrific food. Would definitely go again!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
I cannot say enough about how great the experience was.
Food was amazing and the wine recommendation was spot on. 
Service was great. Attentive without being overbearing. Having the chef come out to meet the table at the end was a nice touch.
I have definitely book marked this as a place to return to when I‚Äôm back in Paris

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: In a brilliant location. Beautiful food and wine. Great atmosphere in restaurant. Waiters were very attentive. If visiting Paris again would definitely go back to this restaurant. Top quality!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: un service attentionn√© , un choix vaste et √©clectique . tr√®s bien

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Service was incredible and the pizza was amazing. Not stereotypical French :)

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Just delicious!!!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: For appetiser, I‚Äôve ordered a tuna tartare, I see the staff hold the dish to me but the sauce is floating around, can see clearly the sauce trace, bread was not served hot. Moreover, for every dishes I ordered, nobody gonna introduce the ingredients of the dishes. For the main course, totally disappointed as the sea bass was overcooked. Well, I dun expected to receive a Michelin star restaurant service, but it is the basic manner for the staff to describe the dishes to customer as I dun think this is a brasserie restaurant. For me, i see the service quality more than the taste of the food, which makes me to decide to revisit a restaurant again. Try to communicate with others even they are just normal customer.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The steamed shrimp salads starter is transcendent. Don‚Äôt miss it

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: I have experienced several tastes combined in perfect dish!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: The person at the reception was not really welcoming, he even looked disappointed that we had a reservation. We didn‚Äôt receive any wine/drink list with the food menu and had a hard time catching the attention of the staff to ask for one. We then had to ask for the English menu, although we talked with the waiting staff in English. The waiters were attentive and kind though. The food was fair but nothing special, except from the Apple tart, recommended by the waiter, that was amazing!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: I never leave a review. I had to leave one for Market. Absolutely delicious and great service. A must try!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: First trip to Paris meet my wife and bring her to your restaurant but turn bad service bad food too

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Absolutely atrocious experience. Service was a mess, no one knew what they were doing. Not until the Manager himself had to come from doing whatever he was doing (not in the restaurant) and personally handle the covers did it turn out somewhat better. Completely overrated. Not sure if it was because it was New Year‚Äôs Day or not.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Nice atmosphere and staff but service was slow and the food was luke warm.  Portions were small.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Excellent experience and food was of the finest quality. Great attentive service too.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Our experience at Market was a unique and diverse one.  The food was excellent, truly delicious and prepared perfectly.  The service from our very young waiter (he had only worked there for a few weeks) was quite good. He was pleasant and attentive.  I wouldn't call it a traditional French restaurant in terms of its feel and vibe.  It could have as easily been NYC or LA, but that wasn't a problem.  What was disappointing was the incessant and constant barking of a dog that was tied to a table leg in the bar for the entire time we were dining.  True story, see attached photo.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Hab√≠a un rat√≥n en el restaurante.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Warm and friendly service, great food and location.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Food was absolutely amazing. We ate the group appetizer which was enough for a meal. Entrees were amazing. A bit pricey, but when in Paris, do as the Parisiennes do!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Friendly staff with wonderful food. Outstanding for healthy minded foodies

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Food was quite good - ingredients were fresh and well chosen but the final plates lacked a level of impressiveness at the price point. Service was good. Music was 80s/90s pop which was a relief from holiday music but didn‚Äôt seem to fit with the room.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Our family celebrated Christmas dinner. Average food. Overall disappointing experience. Maybe our expectations were too high. Definitely overpriced for value received.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Christmas Eve was special spending it at Market.  We ordered appetizers, dinner and enjoyed the wine we selected.  Having two teens, one of whom is Vegan could have been difficult, but the menu offered options we all enjoyed.

Text: The food was very over priced and the menu was unfocused with Italian and Asian dishes. I had the lamb chops which were very good but the appetizers were horrible. I would never recommend this restaurant to anyone. It was $250 for four people and we left very unsatisfied.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text:
Cher certes..... pour un midi 120‚Ç¨ a deux, sans vin, et, sans dessert....En revanche tellement bon, service impeccable !!!
VS

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: Very polite staff, food was prompt, and the treated us with great service.  Quite and dim lit gives you a great opportunity have conversation with those around you.

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: This place can only be described as AMAZING! I went here for my birthday and everyone treated me so well and professionally, they acknowledged it was my birthday and everyone was so kind, the food and cocktails were amazing and I would definitely come here again!

Restaurant_Name: Restaurant Market By Chef Jean Georges
Text: C'√©tait un de nos restos pr√©f√©r√©s ou nous sommes all√©s plusieurs fois jusqu'a quelques ann√©es pass√©es. Maintenant vraiment trop cher pour ce qu'on re√ßoit. Int√©rieur, personnel et ambiance sont vraiment ok.
